entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is mentioned as having a conversation with Hermione about Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is also a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as being unsure if people believed Dumbledore's story.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as finishing his apple pie before leaving the hall.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who died in the story. His death is discussed by Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who was killed by Voldemort. His death is mentioned as a traumatic event for the students.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story who killed Cedric and fought Harry in the maze.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione have a conversation about Dumbledore's death on the first-floor landing.
Dumbledore was killed by Voldemort, which is mentioned as a fact by Harry to Hermione.
Hermione believes Dumbledore's story about Voldemort's return and Cedric's death.
Ron finishes his apple pie before leaving the hall.
